subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brady Aiken, the 18-year-old left-hander who did not sign after being last year’s No. 1 draft pick by the Houston Astros, had Tommy John surgery, he said in a statement on the Players’ Tribune website.
snippet: Brady Aiken, the 18-year-old left-hander who did not sign after being last year’s No. 1 draft pick by the Houston Astros, had Tommy John surgery, he said in a statement on the Players’ Tribune website.
